org.universAAL.ri.rest.manager.server

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.universAAL.ri.rest.manager.server.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends Object
    Helper class to centralized access to configuration parameters, which should help when porting to universAAL Config Manager.
    Author:
    alfiva

    • Method Detail

      • getGCMKey

        public static String getGCMKey()
        Get the Server Application Google Cloud Messaging Key. There is a different one for each server.
        Returns:
        App Server GCM key

      • getGCMDry

        public static boolean getGCMDry()
        Get if DRY mode: messages to GCM are handled OK, but not actually delivered to clients. For testing purposes.
        Returns:
        true if in DRY mode (no messages sent to clients)

      • getLogDebug

        public static boolean getLogDebug()
        Determine if additional INFO logging is available. This is used when the information to be logged may contain sensitive data.
        Returns:
        true if everything should be logged

      • getDBPath

        public static String getDBPath(ModuleContext context)
        Get the path where the folder containing the DB will be read/created. Only used if using Derby DB persistence (default).
        Returns:
        Path to folder of the DB

      • getRemovalTime

        public static Long getRemovalTime()
        Get the value, in milliseconds, of time at which removal of older stored data will be removed. Only for Derby DB Persistence.
        Returns:
        Minimum age, in milliseconds, at which the data will be removed (data older than this will be removed)

      • getServerUSR

        public static String getServerUSR()
